data.title: SonicWall Firewalls, VPN, Cloud App & Endpoint Security
data.meta_description: Explore the SonicWall Showcase for the latest solutions on next-generation firewalls, endpoint security, cloud app security and wireless access points.
data.text:
About SonicWall

Distributed workforces are on the rise. Hybrid environments are the norm. But legacy cybersecurity methods are full of blind spots and built around office-centric workforces. SonicWall Boundless Cybersecurity moves away from constrained security approaches to modern, unbound and cost-effective security you can trust.

Read the 2023 Mid-Year Threat Report from SonicWall (PDF)

Next-Gen Firewalls / Management

SonicWall next-generation firewalls provide the security, control and visibility you need to maintain an effective cybersecurity posture, no matter what your industry is or where your users work. Add centralized management and elevated security with Network Security Manager.
